mapper.select: select count(*) from (select qna.*, row_number() over(order by qna_seq desc) rn from qna)
mapper.update: update qna set qna_view_count = qna_view_count + 1 where qna_seq = #{value}
mapper.select: select * from (select qna.*, row_number() over(order by qna_seq desc) rn from qna where qna_title like '%'|| #{searchWord}||'%') where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from qna where qna_title like '%'|| #{searchWord}||'%'
select count(*) from qna where qna_writer = #{searchWord}
select m.mem_photo from member m ,(select * from qna where qna_seq = #{value}) b where m.mem_id = b.qna_writer
